about author

Johnsen A web developer living in Hangzhou, China.

site colophon

This site is made on my RMBP, designed in Chrome with Google Fonts: Noto Serif & PT Serif, and Open Iconfont: Font Awesome, styled with handwritten SASS, generated by Jekyll, hosted on Github Pages. All posts are composed in Markdown and syntax is highlighted with Rouge. All code is written in Sublime Text. I also have been trying to keep it neat and responsive.
